title: feat: added scores firehose endpoint
body: Adds the scores endpoint <https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-scores> though the method `Osu::scores`.

title: dep: bump hyper & friends to 1.0
body: Technically a breaking change because the variant `OsuError::ConnectorRoots` was added.

title: feat: build client with given token
body:
Adds the method `OsuBuilder::with_token` to provide a previously acquired `Token`. If the token's refresh value and an expire value is given, the client will also refresh the token automatically.

Closes #39

title: Update rosu-mods to v0.2
body: Seems to still compile :P

title: feat: add friends endpoint
body: Adds the method `Osu::friends` to retrieve a `Vec<User>` representing the authenticated user's friends. Note that this endpoint only works when authenticated with the `FriendsRead` scope.

title: feat!: allow users to specify scopes
body: Breaking change: `OsuBuilder::with{_local}_authorization` now takes an additional argument of type `Scopes`

title: fix!: adjust difficulty attribute types
body:
Adjusted fields within `BeatmapDifficultyAttributes` struct:
- Adds `speed_note_count` to `GameModeAttributes::Osu`
- Removes `score_multiplier` from `GameModeAttributes::Mania`
- Changes `f32` to `f64` for better precision

title: feat: improve mods deserialization error
body:
Since mods are first deserialized into a `RawValue` which is then itself used as deserializer, an error will lose information about the line and column.
With this PR it still doesn't specify the right values w.r.t. to entire deserialization body but it prints the `RawValue` which makes it much easier to reason with those adjusted line and column values.

title: feat!: add daily challenge user stats
fix: anticipate stats field not being present
body: The `rank_change_since_30_days` field for ranking entries isn't always present and that's fine, we just have to not error when it's not there.

title: feat: add field rank_change_since_30_days in UserStatistics
body: Adds `rank_change_since_30_days` field in `UserStatistics` struct.

title: feat: added local oauth
body:
Adds the method `OsuBuilder::with_local_authorization`. 

Upon building the builder, it prints an authorization url to stdout and awaits a TCP connection on `localhost:[port from redirect uri]`.

title: refactor!: use rosu-mods
body:
- Remove the `generate-mods` binary and workspace structure
- Instead of implementing types for mods, import them from [`rosu-mods`](https://github.com/MaxOhn/rosu-mods)

title: refactor!: remove rkyv feature
body:
This removes the `rkyv` feature and all the trait implementations that came with it.

The deserialization world contains various frameworks, each coming with their own strengths and weaknesses. It can be argued that it is too opinionated to support one over the other for a library.

Additionally, adding the code bloat of implementing traits for *all* types and their entire contained data is pretty much always overkill. Chances are users would only need support for very few types. And even when handling those types, serialization can often times be significantly improved by ignoring all pieces of irrelevant data.

For people that depended on the `rkyv` feature, I recommend to look into the `rkyv::with::{ArchiveWith, SerializeWith, DeserializeWith}` traits which essentially allow trait implementations of `rkyv::{Archive, Serialize, Deserialize}` on remote types. The [`rkyv-with`](https://github.com/MaxOhn/rkyv-with) even provides a way to derive those `*With` traits.

title: Allow GetReplay/GetScore APIs without gamemode
body: They are allowed per the [API docs](https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#get-apiv2scoresscoredownload).

title: feat!: added unknown mod
body:
Instead of breaking as soon as an unknown mod is encountered, `GameMod` and `GameModIntermode` now have a dedicated variant to catch the new `UnknownMod` struct which only contains the mod's acronym.

Deserialization now uses the non-fallible way to handle mods, as does the `FromStr` impl.

Conversion between `GameMods` and `GameModsIntermode` now has a checked and an "unknown mod" version.

title: feat: added legacy_only query parameter
body:
Adds the `legacy_only` query parameter on all endpoints that support it to exclude lazer scores from the response.
Note that their data still comes in "lazer format" unless `legacy_scores` is set to `true`.

title: refactor!: removed Cursor struct
body:
Removed the `Cursor` struct as it is deprecated by the osu!api. Instead, it now uses strings as encoded cursors.

As a small bonus, types that used to contain the `Cursor` type are now archivable.

title: feat!: added events endpoint
body:
Adds the `/events` endpoint.

Breaking changes:
- Renamed the struct `GetRecentEvents` to `GetRecentActivity`
- Renamed the struct `RecentEvent` to `Event`
- Renamed the method `Osu::recent_events` to `Osu::recent_activity`

title: feat!: add query parameters for mapset search
body:
Adds boolean setter methods to `GetBeatmapsetSearch`:
- `recommended`
- `converts`
- `follows`
- `spotlights`
- `featured_artists`

Each one defaults to `false`.

Breaking changes:
- Removed the method `GetBeatmapsetSearch::any_status` and instead `GetBeatmapsetSearch::status` now takes an `Option<RankStatus>`; `None` means "any"
- Renamed `BeatmapsetSearchSort::RankedDate` to `BeatmapsetSearchSort::ApprovedDate`
- Added the `BeatmapsetSearchSort` variants `Creator`, `Nominations`, and `LastUpdate`

title: feat!: include count_* in user stats
body:
Includes breaking changes, added new fields to `UserStatistics`:
- `count_300`
- `count_100`
- `count_50`
- `count_miss`

title: feat!: undeprecate multiple users endpoint
body:
Removed the deprecation warning on `Osu::users` and it no longer always returns an error. Instead, it now provides `User` (not extended) data for up to 50 users, including statistics for all modes.

This PR includes breaking changes:
- The `User` struct has a new field `statistics_modes: UserStatisticsModes`
- The `Osu::users` method no longer takes a `&[u32]` but a `impl IntoIterator<Item = u32>`

title: feat: adjust code contentions
body: Adjusted coding conventions in `lib.rs` and added constness for various methods as a result.

title: feat: fetching legacy score data
body: Adds `legacy_scores` methods to endpoints that retrieve scores. If specified as `true`, the returned scores will contain legacy data, i.e. a different grade and score calculation, legacy mods, a different score kind, and less populated statistics.

title: Make Medal instructions optional
body: Sometimes osu! API returns medals without instructions (the hush-hush ones I guess?)

title: perf!: box big structs
body:
Boxes most fields of (optional) type `User(Extended)`, `Beatmap(Extended)`, and `Beatmapset(Extended)`.
This causes more allocations but reduces struct sizes significantly and thus reduce the allocation sizes.

```
___Without boxes:___
Score: 2840
Beatmap: 512
BeatmapExtended: 1584
Beatmapset: 408
BeatmapsetExtended: 1376

___With boxes:___
Score: 168
Beatmap: 112
BeatmapExtended: 216
Beatmapset: 408
BeatmapsetExtended: 680
```

title: refactor: encode query via serde_urlencoded
body:
Adds a `Serialize` implementation for request types that create a query.
Also adds a new `as_str` method to some types which returns the result of the `Display` implementation.

title: refactor(v2)!: replace prometheus with metrics dep
body:
Removes the `prometheus` dependency and replaces it with the `metrics` dependency.
Metrics are no longer exposed via `Osu::metrics` and instead are collected directly in the globally installed recorder.

title: refactor: simplify reauth logic
body: This simplifies re-authentication logic by removing some indirection and de-duplicating some of the code.

title: docs: remove comment about `Osu` being cloneable
body:
This fixes #5.

I did decide to wrap `cache` and `metrics` in a `Box` instead. `Osu::cache` has a size of `40 (0x28)` and `Osu::metrics` has a size of `288 (0x120)` (if vscode is to be believed).

title: perf: put serde::Serialize behind feature flag
body:
Requires the `serialize` feature flag if types need to be serialized.
This reduces compile time and binary size if no serialization is required.

title: Add passed field to score model
body: Useful for failed lazer scores which are submitted with a D rank.

title: added `scores/{mode}/{score_id}/download` endpoint
body:
this pr adds the endpoint `scores/{mode}/{score_id}/download` to rosu-v2
see: https://osu.ppy.sh/docs/index.html#scoresmodescoredownload

title: Add method beatmapset_from_map_id
body: This PR adds the ability to search for a beatmapset using a map ID using the beatmapsets/lookup route.
